description: Check portfolio project for errors and resolve issues
context: Examined project structure - Next.js 15 portfolio with React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Three.js, and Framer Motion. Found package.json with all dependencies.
Found CSS parsing error due to corrupted Tailwind config file with duplicate sections and malformed structure.
Fixed corrupted Tailwind config file by removing duplicates and fixing structure. Updated PostCSS config.
Build successful after fixing TypeScript error in performance.ts. Only ESLint warnings remain (mostly about using img tags instead of Next.js Image component).
